title.narrative: Strategic Sector Cooperation on Statistics in Morocco - budget for formulation of Phase I

description.narrative:
Strategic Sector Cooperation on Statistics Between Denmark and Morocco, Phase I
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on statistics is a peer-to-peer cooperation between Statistics Denmark and the Moroccan national statistical body. The Strategic Sector Cooperation on statistics aims at improving the framework conditions of the Moroccan statistical authorities in general and improve a sustainable source of data and statistics in Morocco. Taking a strong stand in the experiences and regulations (e.g. quality principles) that Statistics Denmark bases its organization on this Strategic Sector Cooperation will contribute to improve the framework conditions of the Moroccan national statistical body.

title.narrative: Improved framework conditions for sustainable development

SSC contributions in 2019 to framework conditions within statistics in Morocco: "Yes ".
Score: Yes or No. Yes meaning a project document has been signed
The planned output targets in the project have been met in 2019.
